# QobuzApiService.ResetPassword method

Requests password reset link for the user with given username.

```csharp
public QobuzApiStatusResponse ResetPassword(string username)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| username | The username. |

## Return Value

A QobuzApiStatusResponse indicating if the request succeeded or failed.
